title: FS Allen and Ginter A17 Album pages with all 6 N29 Baseball
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: FS Allen and Ginter A17 Album pages with all 6 N29 Baseball
posts.post_content:
SOLD.. 2 Pages from the Allen and Ginter A17 Album. These 2 pages have all 6 Nz29 Baseball Subjects. The Second page with Getzin and Miller has a crease on the bottom right. It dose not affect any of the cards. Obviously these make a wonderful display small Colorful and highly recognizable. The Buck Ewing literally shines. Asking SOLD for the pair. First I will take them owns them. 

J
